rule: The output must be formatted as HTML.
input: Learning is fun. It expands knowledge. I love learning new things.
evaluation:
```html

Learning is fun. It is an enjoyable process that brings joy and excitement.

It expands knowledge. By learning, you broaden your understanding of the world, enhancing your perspective and skills.

I love learning new things. Discovering new concepts and ideas is not only exciting but also empowering.

```
